程序包 common.utils

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AESUtil
    AES工具类 因为某些国家的进口管制限制，Java发布的运行环境包中的加解密有一定的限制。
    CompressUtil
    压缩工具类 该版本只支持.zip格式的压缩。
    DateUtil
    create by mulin on 2018/08/26 The tool class function is to be improved, If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact OA:linmu.
    DeCompressUtil
    解压缩工具类 该版本可解压的文件格式有：.zip .rar .tar .bz2 .gz .tar.gz tar.bz2 create by mulin on 2018/09/10
    DESUtil
    DES加密。
    FileUtil
    封装一些基本的文件操作 Created by mulin on 2018/12/02..
    FTPUtil
    FTPClient工具类 Create by mulin on 2018/12/01.
    HTTPUtil  
    IOUtil
    Create by mulin on 2018/12/13.
    MD5Util  
    NumberUtil  
    PageUtil
    create by mulin on 2018/08/23
    PooledDataSource
    数据库连接池 Created by mulin on 2018/09/06.
    PropertiesUtil  
    RadixUtil
    进制转换工具类 create by mulin on 2018/09/08 This class is mainly used for operations related to radix.
    RSAUtil  
    StringUtil
    create by mulin on 2018/09/07 This class is mainly used for operations related to strings.
    ThreadSleepUtil
